                                                                        Period period,
                                                                        Member member,
                                                                        boolean received)
Count the number of references of a member by level (Reference.Level)

Parameters:
member - the member
received - true to count received references, false to count given references

search

java.util.List<? extends Reference> search(ReferenceQuery params)
                                           throws DaoException
Searches for references, ordering results by the reference date. If no Reference can be found, returns an empty List. If any exception is thrown by the underlying implementation, wrapped it in a DaoException.

Throws:
DaoException

searchPaymentsAwaitingFeedback

java.util.List<PaymentAwaitingFeedbackDTO> searchPaymentsAwaitingFeedback(PaymentsAwaitingFeedbackQuery query)
Searches for payments that should have but still have no feedback
